name: Cannon Train
description:
What't this?

A short game about a train with a cannon and a car on it. Use the cannon to shoot. If you run out of ammo, just take the car to gather some ammunition. Get back to the train without destroying the car and the ammo collected is ready for use!

How to play?

When in train:

  • Mouse to aim and shoot
  • SPACE to boost your train
  • E to take the car and go get some ammo!

When in car:

  • WASD / Arrows to steer the car
  • E to embark back on train (when near train!)
  • You cannot shoot from car!
